text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product name.

Product name:
Toro Bypass Pruners with Rotating Handle 29202

Product specifications:
Bypass pruner with a rotating handle and 1-inch cutting capacity
Patented 2-position lock for smaller handle spread
Drop forged aluminum body; high carbon sword steel blade
Patented center oiler bolt technology
Lifetime warranty
Ergonomically shaped handles with TPR
Rotating lower handle

Product description:
text.Response A: These are the best pruners! The rotating handle lets you use them comfortably, and they have a 1-inch cutting capacity. The handles are ergonomically shaped and have TPR. They are made of drop forged aluminum with a high carbon sword steel blade. Our patented center oiler bolt technology and 2-position lock make these pruners unique.
text.Response B: The Toro Bypass Pruners with Rotating Handle 29202 is a must-have tool for every gardener or landscaper. It features a rotating handle that provides a comfortable grip and helps reduce hand fatigue. Made with drop-forged aluminum body, this pruner is built to last. Its high carbon sword steel blade is strong and stays sharp for a long time. It has patented center oiler bolt technology that keeps the blade and pivot joint oiled for smooth operation. The pruner is ergonomically designed with a TPR handle for comfortable use. The patented 2-position lock provides a smaller handle spread for easier handling and storage. This pruner has a 1-inch cutting capacity and is backed by a lifetime warranty.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

587.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product name.

Product name:
Toro Bypass Pruners with Rotating Handle 29202

Product specifications:
Bypass pruner with a rotating handle and 1-inch cutting capacity
Patented 2-position lock for smaller handle spread
Drop forged aluminum body; high carbon sword steel blade
Patented center oiler bolt technology
Lifetime warranty
Ergonomically shaped handles with TPR
Rotating lower handle

Product description:

Response A

These are the best pruners! The rotating handle lets you use them comfortably, and they have a 1-inch cutting capacity. The handles are ergonomically shaped and have TPR. They are made of drop forged aluminum with a high carbon sword steel blade. Our patented center oiler bolt technology and 2-position lock make these pruners unique.

Response B

The Toro Bypass Pruners with Rotating Handle 29202 is a must-have tool for every gardener or landscaper. It features a rotating handle that provides a comfortable grip and helps reduce hand fatigue. Made with drop-forged aluminum body, this pruner is built to last. Its high carbon sword steel blade is strong and stays sharp for a long time. It has patented center oiler bolt technology that keeps the blade and pivot joint oiled for smooth operation. The pruner is ergonomically designed with a TPR handle for comfortable use. The patented 2-position lock provides a smaller handle spread for easier handling and storage. This pruner has a 1-inch cutting capacity and is backed by a lifetime warranty.
